title: Ep. 243 - The Dangers Of Cultural Relativism
description:
Today on the show, media has stopped talking about collusion. What a coincidence. Also, a horrific story out of Bangladesh which I think proves yet again that we should not engage in cultural relativism. All cultures are not created equal, it turns out. And Netflix says that the term chick flick is offensive. Their reasoning is hypocritical yet hilarious. Date: 04-19-2019
